page.title: 20We like living in Coniston!
page.content:
The people who co-operated to provide this information all like living in Coniston very much. The disadvantages of high costs, lack of public transport, and somewhat poor social facilities, are far outweighed by the advantages of living in a vibrant community in such beautiful surroundings.
The group who compiled this information are: {ROBERT}and{JACKIE DRAKE {BENJAMIN, PETER}and{SARAH DRAKE and a little help from {TOMAS DRAKE { The photographs were taken by {STEVE BROCKBANK {THOMAS CLOUGH
We have enjoyed telling you about our home and it's surroundings.
